text: I’d really appreciate a slack channel for performance discussions and optimization tips
Thanks for the suggestion! Out of curiosity, do you use sections in your marketplace themes? Also, would you be open to a call to talk more about how your organize your modules in your theme?

Hey <@U03A0GUGY5A> I just deployed an update to the editor’s “developer mode”. If you add a `developerMode=true` query param to the editor url, you’ll now see a link to the design manager at the bottom of any module form:
